Game.Name: Pok√©mon Outlaw
Game.Plot: Pokemon Outlaw is a Pokemon FireRed hack which its theme is crime. Just like its brothers Pokemon CAWPS and Pokemon Korosu, Pokemon Outlaw is unlike the others which contain the story of a 10 years old child. This is the story of a 15 years old orphan boy who is homeless and lives in the slums. Throughout this game, you will follow and watch his rise to greatness in the Pokemon world.
